text: Viuuulentemente mia ("Mine with violence") is a 1982 Italian crime comedy film written and directed by Carlo Vanzina. == Cast == * Diego Abatantuono as Achille Cotone * Laura Antonelli as Anna Tassotti Maloni * Christian De Sica as Juan Lopez y Aragona de Figeroa * Guido Nicheli as Rodolfo * Jackie Basehart as Frank Lovejoy * Diego Cappuccio as Achille's Colleague * Sandro Ghiani as The Sardinian Policeman * Roberto Della Casa as Italian Commissioner * Massimo Sarchielli as Spanish Commissioner * Guido Cerniglia as Lawyer Pardini ==See also == * List of Italian films of 1982 == References == == External links == * Category:1980s crime comedy films Category:Italian films Category:Films directed by Carlo Vanzina Category:Italian crime comedy films Category:1982 comedy films
title: Viuuulentemente mia
